<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■Event■>
\N<Luda Soldier>Hey there, ma'am.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Luda Soldier>I've heard about you. That training session must have been
pretty harsh for a sexy lady like you.

\N<Segi>And what of it? No matter how harsh the path may be, I will
simply do what I must.

\N<Luda Soldier>Heh, that's quite noble of you. If you're up for it, I was
thinking we could have a give-and-take relationship.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Luda Soldier>It's simple, if you play with us, we'll make things easier
for you at the training session. We'll reduce your burden
when the real battle comes.

\N<Segi>...I find it hard to believe that you have the ability to do
such tricks.

\N<Luda Soldier>Heh, don't underestimate us. We have at least that much
authority.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Luda Soldier>It must be tiring dealing with people you know, right?
There's always strings attached. But with us, how about it?
Whatever happens, it stays our little secret.

\N<Luda Soldier>Heh... Well, think it over, will ya? I'm looking forward to
a favorable response.
A

\N<Luda Soldier>Even for you, it must be tiresome to deal with someone you
know, right? There are strings attached after all. In that
case, how about us? Whatever happens, it stays our little
secret.

\N<Luda Soldier>Heh heh... Well, think it over, will you? I'm looking
forward to a favorable response.

\N<Luda Soldier>What's the matter, ma'am? You're heading to the ruins,
right? Better get going, that outfit is quite the sight for
sore eyes... hehe.

<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■Event■>

\N<Luda Soldier>Hey, you're the one, huh? I've heard the story. You're
having trouble gathering money for your husband, aren't you?

\N<Luda Soldier>Heh, if that's the case, I'd be happy to help out. If you
have any personal belongings you want to sell, bring them
here. I'll buy things that other shops won't even take off
your hands.

\N<Luda Soldier>Hey, what's up? What do you want to sell? I'll take anything
that's your personal property for a good price.

\N<Luda Soldier>Heh... indeed. This might fetch a high price from those who
like it. Thanks for your hard work.

like it. Thanks for your hard work.
